did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Roster of Graduates at the United States Naval Training School (Tucson, Ariz.), 1942-1944

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: United States. Navy. Training School (Tucson, Ariz.)

did.abstract: The Naval Training (Indoctrination) School, headquartered in the Old Main Building on The University of Arizona campus from 1942 to 1945, was responsible for training over 10,000 men during World War II. Typescript (carbon) alphabetical roster.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Roster of Graduates at the United States Naval Training School (Tucson, Ariz.) (AZ 044). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Lt. Commander Nicholas, 1966.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Naval Training (Indoctrination) School, headquartered in the Old Main Building on The University of Arizona campus from 1942 to 1945, was responsible for training over 10,000 men during World War II.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript (carbon) alphabetical roster. Includes correspondence of Lt. Commander William Stuart Nicholas.

item.corpname: United States. Navy -- History -- World War, 1939-1945.
